name: quill-claude-extension
description: Private, on-device access to your Quill meetings, minutes, transcripts, notes, contacts, and threads.
long_description: Connect Claude to your local Quill Meetings app to search and retrieve meetings, minutes, transcripts, notes, contacts, and threads. Use it to quickly surface decisions and action items, draft follow-ups, and pull context into docs and CRMs. Runs entirely on your device and communicates with Quill via a local protocol—no cloud upload. Requires Quill for macOS or Windows and Claude Desktop ≥ 0.10.0.

tools.name: get_meeting
tools.description: Get a single meeting by id

tools.description: Return minutes or formatted transcript for a meeting

tools.name: get_transcript
tools.description: Return formatted transcript for a meeting (very long; use judiciously, prefer minutes first)
